sourcesContent:
// Enhanced destinations data with detailed accommodation information
export const destinations = [{
    id: 1,
    name: "Cox's Bazar",
    district: "Cox's Bazar District",
    description: "The longest natural sea beach in the world, stretching over 120km with pristine golden sands and stunning sunsets.",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507525428034-b723cf961d3e?crop=entropy&cs=srgb&fm=jpg&ixid=M3w3NDQ2MzR8MHwxfHNlYXJjaHwzfHxiZWFjaCUyMHN1bnNldHxlbnwwfHx8fDE3NjQ2NzY2OTZ8MA&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&q=85",
    category: "Beach & Coast",
    rating: 4.8,
    duration: "2-3 days",
    tips: [
        "Visit during October to March for pleasant weather",
        "Try fresh seafood at local restaurants",
        "Watch the spectacular sunrise and sunset",
        "Visit Himchari National Park nearby"
    ],
    accommodations: [{
        type: "Beach Resort",
        name: "Sea Pearl Beach Resort & Spa",
        description: "Luxurious beachfront resort offering world-class amenities with direct beach access. Features modern rooms with ocean views, multiple dining options, and a full-service spa.",
        features: [
            "Private beach access",
            "Infinity pool overlooking the ocean",
            "Full-service spa and wellness center",
            "Multiple restaurants (Asian, Continental, Seafood)",
            "Kids club and family activities",
            "Water sports facilities",
            "Free WiFi throughout property",
            "24-hour room service"
        ],
        priceRange: "BDT 10,000 - 20,000/night",
        rating: 4.7,
        contact: {
            phone: "+880 341-64300",
            email: "reservation@seapearlbd.com",
            website: "www.seapearlbd.com",
            address: "Hotel Motel Zone, Kolatoli Road, Cox's Bazar"
        },
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1571896349842-33c89424de2d?w=800&q=80"
    },
    {
        type: "Hotel",
        name: "Ocean Paradise Hotel & Resort",
        description: "Mid-range hotel perfect for families and couples, offering comfortable accommodations with sea-facing balconies and easy access to the beach.",
        features: [
            "Sea-facing rooms with balconies",
            "Rooftop restaurant with panoramic views",
            "Swimming pool",
            "Complimentary breakfast",
            "Tour and travel desk",
            "Free parking",
            "Airport shuttle service",
            "Conference facilities"
        ],
        priceRange: "BDT 8,000 - 18,000/night",
        rating: 4.4,
        contact: {
            phone: "+880 341-51917",
            email: "info@oceanparadisebd.com",
            website: "www.oceanparadisebd.com",
            address: "Marine Drive Road, Kolatoli, Cox's Bazar"
        },
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1566073771259-6a8506099945?w=800&q=80"
    },
    {
        type: "Guest House",
        name: "Coral View Guest House",
        description: "Budget-friendly accommodation with home-like comfort. Perfect for backpackers and solo travelers looking for clean, simple rooms near the beach.",
        features: [
            "Clean and comfortable rooms",
            "Shared kitchen facilities",
            "Common lounge area",
            "Bicycle rental",
            "Local tour guidance",
            "Laundry service",
            "Free WiFi",
            "24-hour security"
        ],
        priceRange: "BDT 1,500 - 4,000/night",
        rating: 4.2,
        contact: {
            phone: "+880 1812-345678",
            email: "coralviewgh@gmail.com",
            website: "facebook.com/coralviewguesthouse",
            address: "Laboni Point, Cox's Bazar"
        },
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1522708323590-d24dbb6b0267?w=800&q=80"
    },
    {
        type: "Beach Cottage",
        name: "Sandy Shores Beach Cottages",
        description: "Charming traditional cottages right on the beach, offering a unique and intimate experience with nature. Perfect for romantic getaways.",
        features: [
            "Private beach cottages",
            "Direct beach access",
            "Outdoor seating areas",
            "BBQ facilities",
            "Traditional Bengali cuisine",
            "Bonfire arrangements",
            "Hammocks and beach chairs",
            "Pet-friendly options"
        ],
        priceRange: "BDT 4,000 - 9,000/night",
        rating: 4.5,
        contact: {
            phone: "+880 1923-456789",
            email: "sandyshores@email.com",
            website: "www.sandyshoresbd.com",
            address: "Sugandha Beach Point, Cox's Bazar"
        },
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1520250497591-112f2f40a3f4?w=800&q=80"
    }
    ]
},
{
    id: 2,
    name: "Bandarban",
    district: "Chittagong Hill Districts",
    description: "A paradise for nature lovers with majestic mountains, waterfalls, and indigenous tribal culture in the heart of the hill tracts.",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1604223190546-a43e4c7f29d7?crop=entropy&cs=srgb&fm=jpg&ixid=M3w3NTY2NzZ8MHwxfHNlYXJjaHwxfHxtb3VudGFpbiUyMGxhbmRzY2FwZXxlbnwwfHx8fDE3NjQ2NzY3MDF8MA&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&q=85",
    category: "Hills & Mountains",
    rating: 4.9,
    duration: "3-4 days",
    tips: [
        "Trek to Nilgiri or Tajingdong peaks",
        "Experience tribal village life",
        "Visit Boga Lake and Shoilo Propat waterfall",
        "Carry warm clothes for hilltop stays"
    ],
    accommodations: [{
        type: "Hill Resort",
        name: "Nilgiri Cloud Resort",
        description: "Perched at 2,200 feet, this resort offers breathtaking cloud-level views and modern amenities amidst pristine natural beauty.",
        features: [
            "Mountain view rooms",
            "Sunrise/sunset viewing decks",
            "Trekking and hiking guides",
            "Traditional tribal cultural programs",
            "Organic farm-to-table restaurant",
            "Bonfire facilities",
            "Photography tours",
            "Meditation and yoga spaces"
        ],
        priceRange: "BDT 4,000 - 14,000/night",
        rating: 4.8,
        contact: {
            phone: "+880 361-62591",
            email: "info@nilgiriresort.com",
            website: "www.nilgiriresort.com",
            address: "Nilgiri Hills, Bandarban Sadar"
        },
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1542314831-068cd1dbfeeb?w=800&q=80"
    },
    {
        type: "Tribal Homestay",
        name: "Marma Heritage Homestay",
        description: "Authentic cultural experience staying with local Marma tribal families. Learn traditional crafts, cuisine, and way of life.",
        features: [
            "Traditional bamboo houses",
            "Home-cooked tribal meals",
            "Cultural immersion programs",
            "Handicraft workshops",
            "Village walks with local guides",
            "Traditional music and dance",
            "Organic garden visits",
            "Language exchange opportunities"
        ],
        priceRange: "BDT 2,750 - 3,700/night",
        rating: 4.9,
        contact: {
            phone: "+880 1734-567890",
            email: "marmahomestay@gmail.com",
            website: "facebook.com/marmahomestay",
            address: "Ruma Upazila, Bandarban"
        },
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1564501049412-61c2a3083791?w=800&q=80"
    },
    {
        type: "Camping Site",
        name: "Boga Lake Adventure Camp",
        description: "Premium camping experience near the mystical Boga Lake with professional equipment and safety measures for adventure enthusiasts.",
        features: [
            "High-quality tents with bedding",
            "Campfire and BBQ facilities",
            "Guided night treks",
            "Star gazing sessions",
            "Adventure activities (rock climbing, rappelling)",
            "Safety equipment provided",
            "Camp meals included",
            "Professional guides and instructors"
        ],
        priceRange: "BDT 4,000 - 8,000/night",
        rating: 4.6,
        contact: {
            phone: "+880 1845-678901",
            email: "bogalakecamp@adventure.com",
            website: "www.bogalakecamp.com",
            address: "Boga Lake Trail, Ruma, Bandarban"
        },
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1504280390367-361c6d9f38f4?w=800&q=80"
    },
    {
        type: "Eco Lodge",
        name: "Chimbuk Hill Eco Lodge",
        description: "Sustainable accommodation built with eco-friendly materials, offering panoramic hill views while minimizing environmental impact.",
        features: [
            "Solar-powered facilities",
            "Rainwater harvesting system",
            "Organic garden produce",
            "Nature trails and bird watching",
            "Eco-workshops and tours",
            "Library with local history books",
            "Yoga and wellness programs",
            "Zero-plastic initiative"
        ],
        priceRange: "BDT 4,000 - 7,000/night",
        rating: 4.7,
        contact: {
            phone: "+880 1956-789012",
            email: "info@chimbukecolodge.com",
            website: "www.chimbukecolodge.com",
            address: "Chimbuk Hill Road, Bandarban"
        },
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1499696010180-025ef6e1a8f9?w=800&q=80"
    }
    ]
},
{
    id: 3,
